title: Patrice Bergeron And Brad Marchand Lead The Way For Boston’s Penalty Kill
text:
by NESN Video on Tue, Mar 28, 2017 at 8:03PM 1,099 Tweet 
The Bruins’ penalty kill improved over the weekend in Boston’s win over the New York Islanders, and the B’s must continue to play great on special teams if they want to make the postseason. 
The Bruins have two of the NHL’s best penalty killers in Patrice Bergeron and Brad Marchand. The Bruins’ stars showed that in the first period Tuesday night against the Nashville Predators when they helped kill off an early penalty after Torey Krug was called for cross-checking.
